tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patent_applications (
    application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    application_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE application_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  update_text TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES patent_applications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    applicant_name STRING,
    application_date DATE,
    status STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES pharmaceutical_products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    update_date DATE,
    update_content STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES patent_applications(application_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_applications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    application_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE product_details (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    dosage_form VARCHAR(50),
    indication VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE applicant_details (
    applicant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE application_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_description TEXT
);
